environment.description: Go checksum database for module verification

environment.name: GOPRIVATE
environment.description: Comma-separated list of module path prefixes for private modules

environment.name: GONOPROXY
environment.description: Comma-separated list of module path prefixes to fetch directly

environment.name: GONOSUMDB
environment.description: Comma-separated list of module path prefixes to skip checksum verification

environment.name: EDITOR
environment.description: Default text editor for Git commits and file editing

functions.name: go_init_project
functions.description: Initialize a new Go project with module
commands: if [ -z "$1" ]; then echo "Usage: go_init_project <module-name>"; return 1; fi

functions.name: go_test_all
functions.description: Run tests for all packages with coverage

functions.name: go_deps_update
functions.description: Update Go dependencies and tidy modules

files.content:
# golangci-lint configuration
run:
  timeout: 5m
  tests: true

linters-settings:
  gofmt:
    simplify: true
  govet:
    check-shadowing: true

linters:
  enable:
    - gofmt
    - govet
    - golint
    - ineffassign
    - misspell

checks.name: go_installed
on_failure: echo 'Go is not installed. Please install Go from https://golang.org/dl/'
